messages.subject: Re: When it kicks in
messages.msgSnippet: This made me giggle.  We just ask that they please don t eat in our bed as we don t like the crumbs...lol
messages.messageBody:
This made me giggle. We just ask that they please don't eat in our bed as we don't like
the crumbs...lol

--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "The Patersons" <tuipiri@...> wrote:
>
> To the lady who's sick of picking up after her daughter...
>
> My nine year old today said to me: "I've kind of made an agreement with
> myself that I won't eat stuff in my bed."
>
> Me: "Why's that?"
>
> Her: "Oh, well, I get heaps of crumbs and it's a bit uncomfortable to
> sleep."
>
> Me: "Sounds cool."
>
>
>
> It's much better for her to try it out and figure out how it affects her
> than to just have a rule "Mum says I can't eat in bed."
>
>
>
>
>
> Cecily
>
>
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
>

messages.subject: When it kicks in
messages.msgSnippet: To the lady who s sick of picking up after her daughter... My nine year old today said to me: I ve kind of made an agreement with myself that I won t eat
messages.messageBody:
To the lady who's sick of picking up after her daughter...

My nine year old today said to me: "I've kind of made an agreement with
myself that I won't eat stuff in my bed."

Me: "Why's that?"

Her: "Oh, well, I get heaps of crumbs and it's a bit uncomfortable to
sleep."

Me: "Sounds cool."



It's much better for her to try it out and figure out how it affects her
than to just have a rule "Mum says I can't eat in bed."





Cecily



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
